document.docAuthor: De Oliveira, Luiz Fernando M. & Brescovit, Antonio Domingos
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision and cladistic analysis of ghost spiders of the genus Tafana Simon, 1903 (Araneae: Dionycha, Anyphaenidae), with the descriptions of twelve new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Tafana riveti
–
Berland 1913: 105
, figs 91–96 (descr. of male). —
Roewer 1954: 546
. —
Bonnet 1959: 4232
. —
Brescovit 1997: 90
, figs 225–238.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Males of
Tafana riveti
resemble those of
T. straminea
,
T. kunturmarqa
sp. nov. ,
T. humahuaca
sp. nov. and
T. nevada
sp. nov. , by the apophysis at the base of the embolus short, but differ by retrolateral tibial apophysis short and with large base in retrolateral view and visible subtegulum on palp when not expanded ( Fig. 10C–E ). Females differ from those of other species by the short atrium, triangular hood and lateral lobe curved in the anterior region and sclerotized ( Fig. 10F ).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype
ECUADOR • ♀ ; Cerro Troya ,
5 km S of Tulcan
; [ 0.73333° N , 77.68333° W ]; 1901 ; G. Riveti leg.; MNHN .

subSubSection.paragraph:
COLOMBIA –
Valle del Cauca
• 1 ♂ , Lago Calima ; [ 3°53′44″ N , 76°29′41″ W ];
Jan. 1979
; W. Eberhard leg.; MCZ
. –
Magdalena
• 1 ♂ ; Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta ; [ 10°53′27.3″ N , 73°59′43.9″ W ];
28 Sep. 2017
; L. Martínez leg.; IBSP 223307
.

PERU –
Cuzco
• 1 ♂ ; Machu Picchu ; [ 13°9′47″ S , 72°32′44″ W ];
19–23 Jun. 1964
; B. Malkin leg.; AMNH
.

The type locality of Cerro Troya, 5 km south of Tulcan was defined using a database of Wharton Lab, Department of Entomology, Texas A&M University from http://mx.speciesfile.org/projects/8/public/public_content/show/21273?content_template_id=88.
Male and female described by Brescovit (1997: 90 , figs 225–238).

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 9. A, C–D .
Tafana silhavyi ( Caporiacco, 1955 )
, ♂ (MNHN 11312). A . Left palp unexpanded, ventral view (arrow indicating character). C . Left palp expanded, prolateral view. D . Left palp expanded, retrolateral view (arrow indicating character). B .
Tafana riveti (MCZ)
, ♂, left palp. E–F .
Tafana riveti (MCZ)
, ♂. E . Left palp, retrolateral view. F . Left palp, prolateral view (arrow indicating character). Abbreviations: 1= primary loop of the sperm duct; 2= secondary loop of the sperm duct; ABE=apophysis of base of the embolus; BH =basal haematodocha; C=cymbium; Ch =character; E =embolus; EP=embolic process; F = fundus; MA=median apophysis; MH= median haematodocha; P=petiole; SD = sperm duct; ST =subtegulum; T=tegulum. Scale bars: A–B, E–F =0.25 mm; C–D=0.5 mm.
